post.body: I'll tweet as soon as it's live.
Very cool! Hopefully I'll clear some time next week to dig into it.
how much time / money investment did that take them?
it's all about the elevation. We're at 3,000 ft. Snow level is down to 1500 - 2000 feet right now.
There hasn't been this much since 2002 or so -- every year we might get a dusting; this is over a foot.
I don't live near Riverside -- I'm on the top of the Cajon Pass. Riverside is about fifty miles away. :-)
Hesperia, in the high desert of Southern California, about eighty miles east of Los Angeles.
Plenty coffee, and tea, thank goodness.
still haven't checked it out. :-)
They're really multiplying. Usually if they tweet real stuff, I go ahead and add 'em anyway.... but not any more. Rarr!
You betcha!
I'll never buy another WD -- had a MyBook that lasted a llittle over a year. For what it's worth.
Possible nothing, if I'm patient and just fire it up every few weeks. (see previous tweets on the subject)
That's another great idea. You're chock full of them! ;-)
That's tricky... I'm in So. California and don't make it out to the eastern side of the country very often. Mail it to me?
I couldn't agree more! Thanks!
Apparently I let the stupid thing sit for a week or so and it works for a few hours. I *think* I hae all the data off of it I need
absolutely. Jet packs are for shopping mall opening day stunts. :-)
I suspend my Applehate when it comes to the iPod Touch... I'd take that over a flying car, even.
no kidding!
screw it. video still uploading and I'm tired. We'll pick this up in the morning. G'night!
hey, youtube, you know what would be nifty? A status bar on video uploads, fer crissakes! Jeez...
A new episode of the Teen Poetry video podcast is being rendered right now... will post before I go to bed tonight! I know you're excited!
Welcome new twitterpal @VictoriaBelcher!
hah! tried to rescue my sister-in-law's snow-trapped car -- couldn't even get out of my driveway in my wife's 4-runner! Snowed in!
time to eat again!
okay, that's it. I'm blocking everyone whose website is a one-page brochure for MLM or network marketing. Don't bother me.
Just finished an interview for @stephenkil's Tea and Chat podcast. And while he didn't ask, it's coffee and the morning and tea at night.
time for breakfast!
Welcome new twitterpal @nylvi!
Welcome new twitterpals @JeffFajans and @stiennon!
Welcome new twitterpals @lucylovegood, @queenoftheclick and @Montaignejns!
Just rediscovered the amazing Firefox plugin DownThemAll. What a timesaver.
Thanks for the follow, @foxxmedia -- please tweet something beside promo for your website and I'll follow you back.
Hungry now.
Music library reloaded, including 1,400 podsafe tracks. Note to indie artists: tag your MP3s, please. Jeez.
omg the levelator is teh slow on a large file.
I think in honor of getting back all my DIY and podsafe music, I'll do a podcast today. Indeed.
Good morning! Fixing up my music library after recoving it ALL (yay!) from dying hard drive yesteday.
Wither Podango... I was gonna blog, but these guys have it right; read theirs: http://snurl.com/96lj7 http://snurl.com/96ljk
